CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 6, 1965, p.6, reads: "GIFTS GALORE...were showered upon Mrs. Delores Nisby for her new son, four-week-old Shawn Elliot. Given by Maude Jones and Barbara Cooks at the honoree's home on Hermitage St., the shower was attended by many friends of the proud mother.  Seated left to right: Mrs. Nisby, Shirley Pryor and Elva Frederick.  Standing in second row: Mmes. Vivian Lane, Frances Frederick, Lennia Potter, Sylvia Jeter, Harriet Thomas, Mrs. Jones, Delores Clark, Mrs. Cooks, Delores Perry, Frances Nunn, Elva Bussey and Arthela Everhardt.  Last row: Mmes. Marion Slatter, Charlotte Nelson, Janice Hamm, Sarah Mack, Dorothy Gardin and Fannie Baugh. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of twenty-one women gathered around Delores Nisby opening presents for birth of her son Shawn Elliot, including seated left to right: Delores Nisby, Shirley Pryor, Elva Frederick; second row: Vivian Lane, Frances Frederick, Lennia Potter, Sylvia Jeter, Harriet Thomas, Mrs. Jones, Delores Clark, Mrs. Cooks, Delores Perry, Frances Nubb, Elva Bussey, Arthela Everhardt; third row: Marion Harris Slater, Charlotte Nelson, Janice Hamm, Sarah Mack, Dorothy Gardin, and Fannie Baugh, gathered in Nisby home on Hermitage Street
